job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Position: Machine Learning Engineer

Location: 100% Remote

Duration: 6-month Contract-to-Hire

Start: ASAP

 

Job Description/Objective:

This will be a 6-month contract with full-time employee conversion. This is a 100% remote role, where you will be working on an exciting, cutting-edge team. This position develops efficient and scalable data science systems that enable integration of machine learning (ML) applications into healthcare operations, strategy, value improvement, care advancement, patient safety and satisfaction. This position will partner with data scientists, application developers, data architects, and system engineers to recommend and develop ML systems and pipelines. This position will be responsible for learning, recommending, and implementing cutting edge machine learning methodologies and tools in creative and novel ways.

 

This person would be the tone setter and first one in the Machine Learning Engineer role, with their plan to build out a team behind you.

 

Fun Fact about our relationship with this client: We have placed half of their data architect team over the last 18 months with GREAT feedback on culture and the leadership.

 

Qualifications

  • CI / CD Experience
  • Data Engineering experience (full project life cycle, deployment to production)
  • Some sort of data science exposure
  • Experience doing end-to-end implementation of an ML pipeline for ML model deployment.
  • SQL & Python experience
